name: D-SCENT
description:
A game where you play as a dice rolling down a hill.

This game was made for the GMTK game jam 2022. The theme was "Roll of the dice". Try to get as far down as possible while avoiding pits and rocks.

Controls
  • Space - Jump

Credits :
